hooks.command: echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" | grep -qE '\.(env|db)$' && echo 'BLOCKED: Cannot edit .env or .db files' && exit 1 || exit 0
echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" | grep -qE 'docs/architecture/ADR' && echo 'WARNING: Modifying ADR document - ensure this change is intentional and documented' || exit 0
echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" | grep -q '\.py$' && uv run mypy --no-error-summary $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS 2>/dev/null || true
echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" | grep -qE 'src/' && uv run pytest tests/ -x -q --tb=short 2>&1 | head -20 || true
